project.description:
This job loads genomic (VCF) data into the HPDS format. it expects a directoy containing two elements:
vcfIndex.tsv - a file describing the VCF file(s) to be loaded
vcfLoad/ - a directory containing the vcf file(s) that will be read and converted to the hpds format
When this job is complete, restart the PIC-SURE services for access to the data.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LOAD_DIRECTORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The path to the directory containing a vcfIndex.tsv describing the vcf files to load

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cp $LOAD_DIRECTORY/vcfIndex.tsv /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/
docker run \ -v /usr/local/docker-config/hpds:/opt/local/hpds \ -v $LOAD_DIRECTORY/vcfLoad:/opt/local/hpds/vcfInput \ -v /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all:/opt/local/hpds/vcfOutput \ -e HEAPSIZE=4096 -e LOADER_NAME=VCFLocalLoader hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-etl:LATEST
